titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,8-dihydroxy-4-nitro-5-(phenylamino)-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/26/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,8-dihydroxy-4-nitro-5-(phenylamino)-.
